description: prompts to present when transferring a file
author: J. Voigt

prompts.info: Specify the study this file should be associated with.
prompts.text: Which study is this file for?

prompts.info: Specify the trial this file should be associated with.
prompts.text: Which trial is this file a part of?

prompts.info: You can provide an optional note or comment.
prompts.text: Any additional note or comment to include?
prompts.example: This is the crucial data file in this study.
